languages.text: Этот параметр определяет, насколько персонаж снижает шанс успешного {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} его атак противником. Чем выше значение этого параметра, тем эффективнее будет атака персонажа. На снижение парирования влияет оружие, которое использует персонаж.

This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.
languages.original_text: Этот параметр определяет, насколько персонаж снижает шанс успешного {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} его атак противником. Чем выше значение этого параметра, тем эффективнее будет атака персонажа. На снижение парирования влияет оружие, которое использует персонаж.

traits.locale_text:
This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

languages.text:
Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie sehr ein Charakter die Chancen seiner Gegner verringert, Angriffe erfolgreich zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}. Je höher der Wert dieses Parameters ist, desto effektiver ist der Angriff des Charakters.
Die Parieren-Reduktion wird von der Waffe beeinflusst, die der Charakter benutzt.
languages.original_text:
This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

traits.locale_text:
Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie sehr ein Charakter die Chancen seiner Gegner verringert, ihre Angriffe erfolgreich zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}. Je höher der Wert dieses Parameters ist, desto effektiver wird der Angriff des Charakters sein.
Die Parieren-Reduktion wird von der Waffe beeinflusst, die der Charakter benutzt.

languages.text:
Ce paramètre détermine dans quelle mesure un personnage réduit les chances des ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} ses attaques. Plus la valeur est élevée, plus l'attaque du personnage est efficace.
La réduction de parade dépend de l'arme utilisée par le personnage.
languages.original_text:
This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

traits.locale_text:
Ce paramètre détermine dans quelle mesure un personnage réduit les chances des ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} ses attaques. Plus la valeur de ce paramètre est élevée, plus l'attaque du personnage est efficace.
La réduction de parade dépend de l'arme utilisée par le personnage.

languages.text:
此属性决定可以降低目标敌人成功{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}的几率。此属性值越高，角色的攻击就越不容易被敌人招架。
招架减免会受角色使用的武器影响。
languages.original_text:
This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

traits.locale_text:
此属性决定可以降低目标敌人成功{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}的几率。此属性值越高，角色的攻击就越不容易被敌人招架。
招架减免会受角色使用的武器影响。

languages.original_text: This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be. Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

languages.text:
Este parámetro determina cuánto reduce un personaje la probabilidad de que el enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} sus ataques. Cuanto mayor sea este parámetro, más efectivo es el ataque del personaje.
La reducción de parada depende del arma con la que se ataque.
languages.original_text:
This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

traits.locale_text:
Este parámetro determina cuánto reduce un personaje la probabilidad de que el enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} sus ataques. Cuanto mayor sea este parámetro, más efectivo es el ataque del personaje.
La reducción de parada depende del arma con la que se ataque.

languages.text:
このパラメータは、敵がキャラクターの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}成功確率をどれだけ下げられるかを決定する。パラメータの値が高いほど、キャラクターの攻撃が効果的になる。
受け流しの減少はそのキャラクターが使用している武器に影響される。
languages.original_text:
This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.

traits.locale_text:
このパラメータは、敵がキャラクターの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}成功確率をどれだけ下げられるかを決定する。パラメータの値が高いほど、キャラクターの攻撃が効果的になる。
受け流しの減少はそのキャラクターが使用している武器に影響される。

languages.text:
Bu parametre, bir karakterin yapacağı saldırıyı düşmanın başarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} olasılığının ne kadar azalacağını belirler. Bu parametrenin değeri ne kadar yüksekse karakterin saldırısı da o kadar etkili olur.
Savuşturma azaltımı, karakterin kullandığı silahtan etkilenir.
languages.original_text:
This parameter determines how much a character reduces enemies' chances to successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} their attacks. The higher the value of this parameter, the more effective the character's attack will be.
Parry reduction is affected by the weapon the character is using.
